channel.title: Dragon-History [Delta] ~~UNIQUE~~
channel.description:
Well, i'll start off by saying a couple things about my server. Okay,Its a twin pack that means :Source and client! This server is a Delta base, which most people like, and i'm big fan of it ,it is very fun to code, and play around with, and I hope you all like my server, and I know, this isnt the 'Fullest' server, and not the greatest, and I will have more updates in my upcoming releases, thanks. Contents... -Edgeville PKing -Mage Bank pking -Almost all skills -New Home -New monsters ! ~~ Reaper~~ -Vengeance Skull -Special attacks [Obviously] -special attacks : Vesta longsword, Dragon claws -New items Dragon claws, Vesta longsword -Perfect armadyl wearing with Perfect bonus ! -Godwars -New models -Dragonfire shield fixed ! -Added object training, u still can train on npc if u want. -Added tutorials in the source, u can always try out they will work 100% What I am working on? -Working for a better pest control means : monsters, better rewardz, better timers, better interfaces. 30% done -Better barrows system : Spade dig on each hill, realistic barrows hit, realistic rewards. 45% done -New minigame 40% -I want to add like 20-30 new models in the new client. 10% -More Monsters. 30% -Portal chambre.10% -Castle wars. 50% -Duel arena.30% And finally, what everyone LOVES, Pictures. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/eakxlz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2vwikuf.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/34t5nhc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/90re2s.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/28m0607.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ro53jm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2vwikuf.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/qoy3r7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/23w041c.jpg[/img] That was all, i hope u liked it. ~~Download~~

Source && Client

-*dont advertise Credits: Delta 90%(for making the whole base) aintaro 10% f(or chaning starter and adding some models.) Please leave a comment and tell me what u like and tell me what u dont like, and WHY.

item.title: Dragon-History [Delta] ~~UNIQUE~~
item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

[quote=“Aintaro, post:16, topic:267092”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=352631.msg2704433#msg2704433 date=1236883366]

This is just a regular Delta based server with one custom item.

And? your point is?

Good job mate, i hope you excell this server and it develops well, its a start and you have a long way to go.
Also in future please try croping your images.

My point is, why release a source that has minimal changes?
[/quote]

I changed the positions of the npc and objects, made a clan chat inside it, And added some new models.

thats not done in 5 minutes…so stop breaking people down instead try to motivate them.[/quote]
Omg you’re kiding me how did you change the posiotions of npc’s and objects no way!
Clan chat server sided ? LMAO dude there are like 100000x tut’s for that.
And new models you can find everywhere if you made the models self oke i would have respect for you but sorry you did nothing special.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon-History [Delta] ~~UNIQUE~~
item.dc:creator: @Lichdom Lichdom
item.description:
@Lichdom wrote:

[quote=“Hellz Scape, post:20, topic:267092”]This is my source, you can tell by the Devil’s items. I do know I used Xscape, which used Delta. I think both Xscape, and I deserve credits.
Your leech off of my source is over 10,000% I did a twin pack, you did a twin pack. You added a few customs to my server, big woop. Next time give credit to everyone who did something.
70% Delta
15% Xscape
14% Hellz Scape
1% You[/quote]

Dude Stfu Hellz Scape i doubt u did anything. and even for taking the time i take pics and post and make small changes, he deserves more than “1%” i think he made a nice effort to try and make a good source/client and he suceeded

P.S. Nice Work

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon-History [Delta] ~~UNIQUE~~
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Trey Coder Trey
item.description:
@Coder_Trey wrote:

1.Stop with this ‘Minimal change’ beep, he changed something, and its not truly leeched if he put work into it…
2. Half the time if someone comes out with a delta source, Everyone says ‘Fk u leecher gtfo the forums u no good bastard, ur no good at coding’ … The truth is, if they can get passed the ANTI LEECH its not necessarily LEECHING is it?
3. ANY changes to ANY source makes it not leeched…I could go and get a blank source, and use it with nothing, that’s leeching. If i was to add 1 NPC it wouldn’t be considered leeching, due to the fact i changed something and actually took time to EDIT SOMETHING.

Now all the flamers stfu, and your the ones who think they’re so “1337” at coding… If you are, stop flaming and go code yourself if u think u can do better.

Thanks,
Trey

Read full topic

Delta isn’t that bad of a server source it’s good just 99% of this community can’t code it because they are to stupid to understand coding in java.
